short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change your user agent quickly and easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open source User Agent Switcher for Chrome. Quickly select from a variety of browser user agents, or enter your own.

Source code available at:
https://github.com/pclinger/Chrome-Extension-User-Agent-Switcher
